job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the integration of AI capabilities into both front-end and back-end components of software applications, which is a core aspect of software development.
The phrase 'Experiment and Innovate with AI' and the mention of working with 'large language models (LLMs)' and 'autonomous tools' points towards the development and adaptation of AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI
job_tasks.justification: This phrase clearly describes the process of designing and writing code for web applications, encompassing both front-end and back-end aspects, with a specific application of AI for user experience.

job_tasks.phrase: create autonomous tools and interactive features that redefine how students learn
job_tasks.justification: Creating 'autonomous tools' and 'interactive features' using AI implies the development, training, or fine-tuning of AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products
job_tasks.justification: This describes the end-to-end software development lifecycle, from ideation to deployment and iteration.

job_tasks.phrase: ensure that our solutions meet learner needs
job_tasks.justification: Understanding and addressing the needs of learners falls under understanding the business context and translating it into technical solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Your work will directly impact thousands of students
job_tasks.justification: This phrase emphasizes the business impact and the target audience for the technology being developed.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts
Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success
Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development
integrate both, creating comprehensive and scalable solutions
job_tasks.justification: This refers to combining different development aspects (front-end/back-end) to create functional and scalable software.

job_tasks.phrase: take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of conceptualizing and building complete software products.

job_tasks.phrase: leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the application of AI expertise, which includes model-related work, in product development.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications
job_tasks.justification: This describes the creation and deployment of software applications powered by AI.

soft_skills.phrase: innovative thinkers who can seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems, taking ownership of the entire product
Take ownership of the entire development process
Collaborate with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts
Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success
Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development
take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes developing applications using large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 and Claude, creating autonomous tools, and building user-facing AI applications. This aligns directly with the definition and core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in building and deploying production-grade user-facing software systems powered by generative models.
